name: Mega Man Star Force: Pegasus
description:
When aliens from planet FM plot to invade Earth, alien Omega-Xis escapes to warn a courageous boy, Geo Stelar. Together, they must face the aliens on the electromagnetic system known as the Wave Road, and combine to become the ultimate champion for Earth: Mega Man!

Features

• Dynamic Brother Band system - Play up to 6 friends for power-ups in combat: Favorite Cards, Link Ability, Best Combo, Connect and Transform.
• Call upon the Power of the Elements - Use the Ice Slash attack to instantly freeze foes.
• New Battle System - Enter the Wave Road to battle in the new third person perspective!

As of May 20, 2014, the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service for Nintendo DSi and Wii systems has been retired. Online features of this game are no longer available after this date but this game still provides an entertaining experience in offline mode.
